chunks.text:
Introducing: Timesheet Approvals
Timesheet Approvals are the simplest way to keep time reporting accurate and compliant. Now teams can submit, review, and approve timesheets—without ever leaving ClickUp. 

 
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/5817aff0-6f8b-4b8e-6696-d16ff62fe21b.png> 	
Get accurate data with time entries that are locked post-submission.
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/5817aff0-6f8b-4b8e-6696-d16ff62fe21b.png> 	
Keep approvals easy with automated notifications and in-line comments.
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/5817aff0-6f8b-4b8e-6696-d16ff62fe21b.png> 	
Track time across teams, projects, and customers—all in the Timesheets Hub.
Try it now <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/DA_hCwRG4iRl1WWiRHmTJa7qz?domain=links.clickup.com> 	 
 
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/f7d8898c-97d0-2fed-f959-9080b4d423cb.png> 	
Test out the new time-tracking features with no usage limits for a limited time. Future restrictions apply <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/UWQQCx7J4fQEA33I7IQTyXRgv?domain=links.clickup.com> .	 
 
© 2025 ClickUp | 350 Tenth Ave. Suite 500, San Diego, CA 92101 | Privacy Policy <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/tAdtCyJKgfyOMRRhnSRTxnAH5?domain=links.clickup.com>
